word:
MR No. 1416 - The Workings of Satan; Use of Tithe

     (Written December 17, 1908, from Sanitarium, California, to "Brother and Sister [S. N.] Haskell.") 


     I am often weary, and yet I realize at times the blessing of the Lord resting upon me in large measure. I want to walk humbly with God. I am praying that the Lord will guide me by His Spirit every moment.
